hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT CONVERT(paym.iApplicationKind, SQL_CHAR) + CONVERT(paym.RefValue, SQL_CHAR) + paym.ApplicationKey + paym.AttrID AS operationId, paym.RecivFIO AS counteragent, opers.Account_Receiver AS receiverAccount, paym.Bank AS receiverBank
FROM sbdepdoc_1 opers LEFT JOIN rt_paym_1 paym ON paym.ApplicationKey=opers.ApplicationKey And paym.iApplicationKind=opers.iApplicationKind AND paym.RefValue = 0 AND paym.AttrID = 'пейб_онк' WHERE opers.Referenc = :id AND opers.Date_Document = :date AND opers.NumDayDoc = :dayNumber
